author: TravisEz13
body:
As a non-windows component, the onboarding process is different.  We should:
- [ ] Onboard PowerShell Core to Windows Telemetry
- [ ] Re-enable telemetry for windows
- [ ] Find a story for non-windows platform (out of scope of this issue)

comments.author: vors
comments.body: For telemetry in MS OSS projects, lets learn from `dotnet/cli` experience. Example PR with a discussion https://github.com/dotnet/cli/pull/2724#issuecomment-215277156

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: I haven't done any kind of deep-dive on what they're doing, but I thought I'd also point to [VS Code's telemetry extension](https://github.com/Microsoft/vscode-extension-telemetry).

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: Current plan is to use AppInsights

title: On-board and Enable telemetry for windows
